content:
Classify the quadrilateral in the following figure based on its properties of having four right angles and opposite sides being congruent. Assign 1 if it is a rectangle and 0 otherwise. 
(Note: The figure is not drawn to scale)
Based on the properties you've described—having four right angles and opposite sides being congruent—the quadrilateral is classified as a rectangle. Therefore, you should assign it a 1.
